title: Delineating the role of surface grafting density of organic coatings on the colloidal stability, transport, and sorbent behavior of engineered nanoparticles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,578-587
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00358B, Paper
Junseok Lee, Changwoo Kim, Daniel Schmucker, Seung Soo Steve Lee, Shuchi Liao, Natalie L. CÃ¡piro, Kurt D. Pennell, John D. Fortner
Aqueous stability and sorption affinity (towards target environmental contaminants) of engineered nanoparticles, composed of inorganic nanoparticles and surface stabilizers, are dependent on surface grafting density.
